Home.home_Title: I`m a Full-Stack Developer From Cape Town, South Africa
Home.home_Summary: I`m Imaraan Sheldon. I`m passionate about my personal growth as a Full-stack Developer and I craft unique & high-performing Websites, custom tailored.

Services.services_Description: I excel at problem-solving, leveraging his full-stack development skills to tackle complex challenges with innovative solutions and creative thinking.
I am adept at time management, efficiently balancing multiple projects and deadlines with strategic planning and prioritization to ensure timely and successful outcomes.
I am very resilient, navigating challenges and setbacks with determination and adaptability to achieve his goals and maintain progress.

Education.degree_Description: The National Senior Certificate (NSC) is a South African qualification awarded upon the successful completion of secondary education, serving as a key credential for university admission and employment

Education.school: College of Cape Town; Crawford Campus(2021):
Education.degree_Description: The CCNA—which stands for Cisco Certified Network Associate—is an entry-level information technology (IT) certification issued by networking hardware company Cisco. The CCNA is designed to validate your knowledge on fundamental networking concepts often requested in networking roles in IT positions.

Education.school: College of Cape Town; Crawford Campus(2023):
Education.degree_Description: The Microsoft IT Academy offers specialized training in web design, empowering individuals with the knowledge and skills to create dynamic and visually appealing websites using Microsoft technologies, using programming languages such as Html, Css, C# & mySQL.

Education.school: 314 Imam Haron Rd, Lansdowne, Cape Town, 7780(2024[Current]):
Education.degree_Description: A 6-month full stack web development program with a wrap-around approach to technical upskilling, personal and professional development. LC Studio offers an additional 6 month work-integrated learning experience focusing on tailored learning journeys while simulating the work environment.

Experience.workplace: PALS Clothing; Salt River, Cape Town(2019):
Experience.job_Description: As an assistant designer I provided valuable support to the design team, contributing to the creative process by assisting in tasks such as research, conceptualization, and design implementation.

As an assistant operator of assembly machinery, I am responsible for supporting the efficient operation of the assembly line by assisting with machine setup, monitoring production processes, and ensuring the quality and timely completion of products. I worked as an Assistant Operator for 1 year.

An Information Systems Technician plays a crucial role in maintaining and troubleshooting computer systems and networks, ensuring their optimal functionality. They are responsible for resolving technical issues and implementing upgrades.

As a machine maintenance worker for plastic raw materials manufacturing, I was responsible for ensuring the smooth operation of machinery. This involves conducting regular inspections, diagnosing issues, and performing repairs to prevent downtime and maintain product quality.

Testimonials.name: Robyn Carnow
Testimonials.testimonial: Imaraan is a bubbly and detail-oriented person. Because of this, he is approachable and, additionally, willing to help on peer code review. Upon working in a team, there is no doubt that he always contributes and communicates efficaciously so as to avoid any conflict.

Testimonials.name: Nicki Ables
Testimonials.testimonial: Imaraan is a highly skilled individual. Apart from his crazy sense of humor he is very knowledgeable , creative and dedicated. He creates a comfortable atmosphere and goes the extra mile in all that he does.

Testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
Testimonials.testimonial: Imaraan Sheldon is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with her peers and excels at working on project assignments.She has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, VS Code, and wireframe. I am pleased to introduce him as an exceptional candidate and developer.

Testimonials.name: Timothy Jones
Testimonials.testimonial: Imaraan is a great friend. He is very outgoing, hardworking and has a big heart. I`ve never seen him without a smile and he is always willing to help you in times of need and has great leadership skills

Testimonials.name: Chandre Leigh Davids
Testimonials.testimonial: Imaraan is one of the most Hardworking individuals I know, his web designs are always on point, detailed, creative and unique. He is definitely someone that you'd want on your team with regards to both his uplifting personality and dedication to his work

Testimonials.name: Mihle Lingani
Testimonials.testimonial: Imaraan is an earnest person. He has the ability to achieve anything. His drive to constantly push his limits, to overcome any problem is inspiring. He`s a Jack of All Trades and tries to master it all. You`d think he`s indecisive when you think of all his skills and capabilities. He is very dedicated to self-improvement in all aspects of his life and if learning was a person it would be him
